issue.title: tf::TransformListener() lookups always returning most recent tranform

content.raw:
I have no idea how Ignition could be affecting this other than data streams come from Ignition to the ros1\_bridge node to ROS as opposed to directly from Gazebo to ROS.

Did you run these two experiments back to back on the same computer?  I’m curious if ROS broke transformLookup in an update.
content.html:
I have no idea how Ignition could be affecting this other than data streams come from Ignition to the ros1_bridge node to ROS as opposed to directly from Gazebo to ROS.

Did you run these two experiments back to back on the same computer? I’m curious if ROS broke transformLookup in an update.
